value.title: No more facial recognition? Apple AirPods might be able to recognise the user by checking ear canal
value.excerpt: In the latest development, Apple's AirPods will soon be able to verify a user's identity using the inside of the ear. This will be done using an in-ear biometric device that uses ultrasonic signals. These are then reflected against the walls of a user’s ear canal.
